wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[1 January|1]]''' - Actress [[Jennifer Hale]] is born.
* '''[[2 January|2]]''' - In honour of his 80th birthday the following day, [[The Sunday Times Magazine (2 January 1972)|''The Sunday Times Magazine'']] runs an interview of [[William Cater]] with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], "The Lord of the Legends". 
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] celebrates his 80th birthday.
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]] wishes J.R.R. Tolkien a happy 80th birthday in ''The Times.''
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]] sends Tolkien a jar of tobacco as a birthday present.
* '''[[15 January|15]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]] holds a general meeting and becomes formally constituted. 
* '''[[24 January|24]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 332]].
* '''[[30 January|30]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Michael George Tolkien (30 January 1972)|a letter to his grandson Michael George Tolkien]].
==February==
* '''[[2 February|2]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Dorothy Wood (2 February 1972)|a letter to Dorothy Wood]].
* '''[[2 February|2]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Edmund R. Meskys (2 February 1972)|a letter to Edmund R. Meskys]]
* '''[[6 February|6]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Vera Chapman and the Tolkien Society|a letter to Vera Chapman and the Tolkien Society]].
* '''[[9 February|9]]''' - Actor [[Crispin Freeman]] is born. 
* '''[[16 February|16]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Fay Darrington (16 February 1972)|a letter to Miss Fay Darrington]].
* '''[[26 February|26]]''' - Actor [[Keith Ferguson]] is born.

==March==
* '''[[16 March|16]]''' - Tolkien writes [[letter 333]].
* '''[[27 March|27]]''' - [[Rayner Unwin]] organizes a party in celebration of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s CBE the [[28 March|following day]].
* '''[[28 March|28]]''' - At Buckingham Palace, [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is appointed a [[Order of the British Empire|CBE]] by Queen Elizabeth II.
* '''[[29 March|29]]''' - Actor [[Samuel Hazeldine]] is born.
* '''[[30 March|30]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 334]].

==April==
* '''[[19 April|19]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Eva Heilborn|a letter to Eva Heilborn]].
* '''[[28 April|28]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Mrs Robertson|a letter to Mrs Robertson]].
==May==
* '''[[1 May|1]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Donna Sadlier|a letter to Donna Sadlier]].
* '''[[18 May|18]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 335]].
* '''[[23 May|23]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 336]].
* '''[[25 May|25]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 337]].
==June==
* '''[[3 June|3]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is awarded an honorary Doctorate of Letters by the [[University of Oxford]].
* '''[[6 June|6]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 338]].
* '''[[6 June|6]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 338a]].
* '''[[11 June|11]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Robert Burchfield (11 June 1972)|a letter to Robert Burchfield]].
* '''[[27 June|27]]''' - [[Vera Chapman]] meets [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. He agrees to become [[The Tolkien Society]]'s Honorary President.
* '''[[30 June|30]]''' - [[Mythcon 3]] begins.
* '''[[30 June|30]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 339]].

==July==
* '''[[4 July|4]]''' - [[Mythcon 3]] ends.
* '''[[4 July|4]]''' - [[Letter 339]] is published in the ''Daily Telegraph''.
* '''[[9 July|9]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 339a]].
* '''[[11 July|11]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 340]].
* '''[[27 July|27]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes a [[Desk certificate 27 July 1972|certificate of authenticity]] for the [[Sotheby's Fine English and Continental Furniture Bronzes, Textiles and Works of Art 1825-1930 and French Animalier Bronzes|sale of his desk]].

==August==
* '''[[7 August|7]]''' - Actor [[Karl Urban]] is born.
==September==
* '''[[17 September|17]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 341]].
==October==
* '''[[12 October|12]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Rayner Unwin (12 October 1972)|a letter to Rayner Unwin]].
* '''[[21 October|21]]''' - Actor [[Felix Felton]] dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Master of Middle-earth|Master of Middle-earth: The Fiction of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published.
==November==
* '''[[1 November|1]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s desk is [[Sotheby's Fine English and Continental Furniture Bronzes, Textiles and Works of Art 1825-1930 and French Animalier Bronzes|sold at Sotheby's]].
* '''[[9 November|9]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 342]].
* '''[[21 November|21]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 343]].
* '''[[23 November|23]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 343a]].
* '''[[23 November|23]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 344]].
* '''[[30 November|30]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 345]].
==December==
* '''[[13 December|13]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 346]].
* '''[[17 December|17]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 347]].
==?==
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] returns to [[University of Oxford|Oxford]] and rooms at Merton College.
* '''?''' - Tolkien receives an honorary doctorate from Oxford University.
* '''?''' - The Swedish Tolkien Society [[Forodrim]] is founded.
* '''?''' - Scholar [[Anne C. Petty]] presents her Ph.D. thesis ''[[One Ring to Bind Them All: Tolkien's Mythology|The Creative Mythology of J.R.R. Tolkien: A Study of the Mythic Impulse]]''.
* '''?''' - Scholar [[Stefan Ekman]] is born.
* '''?''' - ''[[A Glossary of the Eldarin Tongues]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1973]] released.
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 5|''Mallorn'' 5]] is published.
{{Years|1969|1970|1971|1972|1973|1974|1975|}}
